## Reflection

Yesterday’s work proved the engine: strict date slugs, triadic structure, working ZIP automation, and glyphs that finally feel stable enough to trust. Today’s entry is the first to arrive *knowing* that the ritual holds.

> The system is now simple: I speak, I date it, I upload — and the archive remembers.
